```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source('_setup.R')
```

Original:

```{r echo=FALSE}
tibble(
  x = c(
    '\\(-\\sqrt{3}\\)', 
    '\\(-\\sqrt{2}\\)', 
    '\\(\\sqrt{2}\\)', 
    '\\(\\sqrt{3}\\)'
  ) %>% 
    map_chr(md),
  y = c(4, 3, 3, 4) %>% 
    paste0('\\(', ., '\\)') %>% 
    map_chr(md)
) %>% 
  gt() %>% 
    cols_label(
      x = '\\(x\\)' %>% map_chr(md),
      y = '\\(x^2 + 1\\)' %>% map_chr(md)
    ) %>% 
  cols_align('right')
```

Com vec_fmt_markdown:

```{r echo=FALSE}
tibble(
  x = c(
    '$-\\sqrt{3}$', 
    '$-\\sqrt{2}$', 
    '$\\sqrt{2}$', 
    '$\\sqrt{3}$'
  ) %>% 
    vec_fmt_markdown(),
  y = c(4, 3, 3, 4) %>% 
    paste0('$', ., '$') %>% 
    vec_fmt_markdown()
) %>% 
  gt() %>% 
    cols_label(
      x = '$x$' %>% md(),
      y = '$x^2 + 1$' %>% md()
    ) %>% 
  cols_align('right') %>% 
  fmt_passthrough(rows = everything(), escape = FALSE)
```
